movies.title: Uncle Marin, the Billionaire
movies.plot: A Romanian peasant is visiting his friend Gogu who works at a hotel on the Black Sea Riviera.At the same hotel the rich American businessman,Mr.Juvett, with many mob enemies on his tail,is mistaken for the peasant Nea Marin,due to their perfect resemblance.The American mob has a contract on Mr. Juvett's life and hit-men have followed him to Romania.Unfortunatelly for Nea Marin he is thrown into Mr. Juvett's world and vice-versa,with hilarious consequences.
movies.simplePlot: A Romanian peasant, visiting a friend who is working at a hotel on the Black Sea Riviera, is mistaken for a look-alike rich American businessman.

biography.bio: Amza Pellea was born on April 7, 1931 in Bailesti, Dolj, Romania. He was an actor and writer, known for Michael the Brave (1970), Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979) and The Punishment (1976). He died on December 12, 1983 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Amza Pellea

actors.character: Uncle Marin Juvete / Mr. Marlon Juvett

biography.bio: Draga Olteanu Matei was born on October 24, 1933 in Bucharest, Romania. She is an actress and writer, known for Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979), Cucoana Chirita (1986) and Iarna bobocilor (1977).
biography.name: Draga Olteanu Matei

biography.bio: Jean Constantin was born on August 21, 1928 in Techirghiol, Constanta County, Romania. He was an actor, known for Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979), Duelul (1981) and Toate pînzele sus (1976). He died on May 26, 2010 in Constanta, Romania.
biography.name: Jean Constantin

biography.bio: Stefan Mihailescu-Braila was born on February 3, 1925 in Braila, Braila, Romania. He was an actor, known for Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979), The Secret of Bacchus (1984) and Fiul muntilor (1981). He died on February 3, 1996 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Stefan Mihailescu-Braila

biography.bio: Sebastian Papaiani was born on August 25, 1936 in Pitesti, Arges, Romania. He was an actor, known for Brigada Diverse intrã în actiune (1970), Pacala (1974) and B.D. in alert (1971). He was married to Eugenia Giurgiu-Papaiani. He died on September 27, 2016 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Sebastian Papaiani

biography.bio: Puiu Calinescu was born on June 21, 1920 in Bucharest, Romania. He was an actor and writer, known for Brigada Diverse intrã în actiune (1970), Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979) and B.D. in alert (1971). He died on May 16, 1997 in Bucharest.
biography.name: Puiu Calinescu

biography.bio: Stela Popescu was born on December 21, 1935 in Slobozia, Ialomita, Romania. She is an actress, known for Papa vient dimanche (2012), Mamaia (2013) and Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979).
biography.name: Stela Popescu

biography.bio: Stefan Banica was born on November 11, 1933 in Calarasi, Romania. He was an actor, known for Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979), Harababura (1990) and Bufetul 'La Senat' (1973). He died on May 26, 1995 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Stefan Banica

biography.bio: Vasilica Tastaman was born on October 6, 1933 in Braila, Braila, Romania. She was an actress, known for Asta-seara dansam in familie (1972), Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979) and Comedie fantastica (1975). She died on March 30, 2003 in Bucharest, Romania.
biography.name: Vasilica Tastaman

biography.bio: Hamdi Cerchez is an actor, known for Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979), Duelistii (1983) and Actiunea Zuzuc (1985).
biography.name: Hamdi Cerchez

biography.bio: Adina Popescu was born on August 1, 1947. She is an actress, known for Dragostea începe vineri (1974), Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979) and Best Intentions (2011).
biography.name: Adina Popescu

biography.bio: Stefan Thuri is an actor, known for Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979), Veronica (1972) and Farewell, Dear Nela! (1972).
biography.name: Stefan Thuri

biography.bio: Brandusa Manu is an actress, known for Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979) and Seeing Things (1981).
biography.name: Brandusa Manu

biography.bio: Corneliu Gîrbea was born on September 5, 1928 in Gheorghieni, Romania. He is an actor, known for Michael the Brave (1970), Uncle Marin, the Billionaire (1979) and Mercenaries' Trap (1981).
biography.name: Corneliu Gîrbea

biography.bio: Mircea Albulescu was born on October 4, 1934 in Bucharest, Romania as Iorgu Constantin Albulescu. He was an actor, known for Actorul si salbaticii (1975), Michael the Brave (1970) and For Motherland (1977). He was married to Maria. He died on April 8, 2016 in Bucharest.
biography.name: Mircea Albulescu
